mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( IDX , TITLE , CONTENTS , COUNT , WRITER , INDATE , BOARDID ) VALUES ( NULL , #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{contents, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{count, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SYSDATE() , #{boardId} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.IDX as idx , A.TITLE as title , A.CONTENTS as contents , A.COUNT as count , A.WRITER as writer , A.INDATE as indate , B.NAME as name , B.NICKNAME as nickname FROM board A LEFT JOIN user B ON A.WRITER = B.ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.IDX=#{idx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_reply ( IDX , SEQ , REPLY , WRITER , INDATE , BOARDID ) VALUES (#{idx} , (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(X.SEQ)+1,1) FROM board_reply X WHERE X.IDX=#{idx}) , #{reply, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SYSDATE() , #{boardId} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.IDX as idx , A.SEQ as seq , A.REPLY as reply , A.WRITER as writer , A.INDATE as indate , B.NAME as name , B.NICKNAME as nickname FROM board_reply A LEFT JOIN user B ON A.WRITER = B.ID WHERE 1=1 AND IDX = #{idx} ORDER BY A.SEQ DESC

SELECT C.IDX AS idx , C.TITLE AS title , IFNULL(C.COUNT,0) AS count , C.NAME AS writer , C.INDATE AS indate FROM( SELECT A.IDX as idx , A.TITLE as title , IFNULL(A.COUNT,0) AS count , A.WRITER as writer , A.INDATE as indate , A.boardId as boardId , B.NAME AS name FROM board A LEFT JOIN user B ON A.writer = B.id WHERE 1=1 AND boardId = #{boardId} )C
